name: Colombia Splitscreen Massacre
description:
Colombia, 2015. The Maoist guerilla movement ELAO aims to overthrow the  government. Make a stand against the enemy, take up arms and kill your friends. In this fast-paced splitscreen shooter for up to 4 players inspired by Goldeneye N64 and Call of Duty!

- 8 maps taking you from the jungles of Colombia to the skyscrapers of Vienna.

-17 guns. Lay down covering fire with the mighty Typ-62 or no-scope with the deadly SWP.

-6 different grenade types, blind your enemy with a flashbang or destroy their bodily integrity with an impact grenade.

-7 perks: More damage, deeper mags, more mobility? Customize your playstyle.

-Original soundtrack by Michael Miksovsky.
